text: Mighty blade forged in a bygone age.
Twin-bladed dagger sought by a legendary adventurer.
Legendary katana tempered in the depths of the earth.
Ninja blade that shines silver like the moon.
Legendary spear said to hold sway over the world.
Legendary fighting knuckles imbued with holy might.
Treasured sword of a renowned general.
Legendary rod tipped with a swirling orb of stardust.
Mysterious brush made from an angel's quill.
Fearsome battle mask that arouses one's fighting spirit.
Flail shaped like a stinger and enchanted with Bio.
Carved bone wristband that grants yetis great power.
